assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study design was approved by the Institutional Review Board at Vanderbilt University Medical Center and the Meharry Medical College (IRB protocol number 15–07-409).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards put forth by the Helsinki Declaration 0f 1975, as revised in 2000(5). Informed consent was obtained from all patients included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ms. Smita Rao, Ms. Kimberly Thomas, Dr.Rajbir Singh, Dr. Eden Biltibo, Dr. Philip Lammers and Dr. Georgia Wiesner declare that they have no conflict of interest. The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
